column5: I haven't been on the board much in the last few weeks, (not that I expect anyone to notice..lol) I can't remember the last time we have been this busy... work is overwhelming right now, hopefully it will start to become reasonable again sometime in March... lol.. Thanks god Monique is here to take the brunt of it.   I am working on a couple of cool contests for every one, Xtreme Anglers gonna have another good one coming soon.  It was all I could do to get the newsletter out, even two weeks late...  I saw a thread directed to me that came and went with out me seeing it...  I promise to try and check in a bit more.
A newbie are you? Welcome to the board!!
No problem TJ....everyone gets busy!  LOL Bernie....
Just be happy you're not working for HeadHunter. He'd be visualizing you walkin' off a cliff about now.
LOL TJ, we didn`t think you were a deadbeat like the rest of us!
No worries TJ.....we know you can't live without us for too long..that and if you were around too much it would ruin that wonderful elusive celebrity allure of yours!!
I think my heart grew fonder?
*sticks fingers down throat*   Cleanup on aisle 4......
Cliff...I think you are being paged!!
Damn, I thought that you were on vacation, again............
Thanks Roy... I was receiving some subliminal messages from across the universe and I was about to blame TJ... changing my thought process as I type.... HH
'S OK by me TJ...who better has the right to be a slacker than the boss ???
with a soft pitch like that here it comes T.J..............I thought you were hibernating their my little fuzzy buddy.  Art
TJ hasn't been around?? Who's been minding the store?
everybody gets busy your no different.
